profile:
Great Canadian is a fully integrated residential and commercial renovation company dedicated to providing sustainable energy solutions for your home or commercial property.

Experienced, professional and trusted, Great Canadian will provide you with the right advice, quality workmanship, excellent service and the best brands of products no matter what your need. All services are competitively priced for your project and include roofing, attic insulation, siding, windows and doors, soffits and fascia, eavestroughs and any related insurance needs. Great Canadian combines skill and technology to provide you the best service possible.

profile:
We provide reliable quality home-exterior services. You can trust us to care for your property like it is our own!

GUTTER CLEANING & REPAIR 
5" & 6" SEAMLESS GUTTER REPLACEMENT 
FASCIA & SOFFIT REPAIR / INSTALL 
SIDING REPAIR / REPLACEMENT
ROOF REPAIR / REPLACEMENT 
LEAF SCREENS / SNOW-STOPS / DRIP EDGE
CUSTOM CLADDING OF WINDOWS / DOORS / ETC 
PROFESSIONAL SELF-REGULATING HEAT-CABLE INSTALLATION 
GENERAL TROUBLESHOOTING FOR LEAKS & DRAINAGE PROBLEMS 
INDUSTRIAL & COMMERCIAL LEAK REPAIRS & SOLUTIONS

WHY YOU CAN TRUST GUTTER DOCTOR:
- Over 20 years in business.
- Over 50,000 happy customers.
- 5 year warranty on installations.

- Trained and experienced technicians.
- Full liability insurance & WCB. 
- A+ rated BBB member.

- Best of Homestars Winner. 
- Top Choice Award Winner. 
- Best of TrustedPros Winner. 
- ThreeBestRated Winner.
- Best of Calgary Winner.

Contact us and we will be glad to help!

Edmonton 780-709-6825

profile:
Reid’s Roofing and Insulation has served residential and commercial customers in the Edmonton region for the past 12 years. Our owner, Jessica Reid is a hands on entrepreneur who has made it her mission to lead positive change within the roofing industry. Reid’s is different in that we consider the wellbeing of your entire home’s building envelop. We are a one stop shop offering all types roofing solutions, attic insulation, eaves troughs, soffits, downspouts and exterior paneling. We’ve been the winner of the Homestars “best of” in the roofing category for the past 7 years and we currently hold a 97% customer satisfaction score. We rate highest in the reputation and responsiveness categories. We are the experts in our field and you can expect honesty, integrity and a desire to serve from every Reid’s team member

Whatever your roofing needs, give us a call today for a free no-obligation in home consultation ! We’re here to serve you, pick up the phone or email us today. We would be happy to hear from you!

profile:
At Weber Exteriors Ltd we try to  provide professional customer service as well as quality workmanship.

We provide the following services:

Siding: - We install different types of siding materials such as: vinyl, james hardie, lux panel, long board, sagiper and others.

Soffit & Fascia: - We also provide few options for soffit and fascia installation and you can choose from vinyl, aluminum, james hardie or lux.

Trim: - We offer a variety of trim options and the best one we have is a custom aluminum trim. It comes in many different colors, can be smooth or embossed and can be custom made to any width and could be as long as 12.6 ft in a solid piece, it is also maintenance free. We also offer other less popular trim such as plastic, smart trim and james hardie. 

Eavestrough: - When it comes to replacing eavestroughs on your home we also try to offer as many options as we can. Usually eavestroughs come in aluminum 5 inches for most residential jobs. 6 inches could be for commercial and could be metal, copper, galvanized, etc. Downspouts usually come in 2.5 x 2.5 or to be more exact the measurements are 2 5/8 x 2 5/8 with an option to upgrade to 3x3 inches.

Fully insured with warranty provided for our work.

Do you have a big project in mind or maybe its a pretty small one. Visit us at SidingRepair.ca and we will answer all your questions.
